rules_text:
When Halls of Limbo enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven’t already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever you journey into the Underworld, choose one –
• Halls of Limbo deals 2 damage to target player.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
